name: Aggressive Urge
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. If this spell was kicked, Agonizing Demise deals damage equal to that creature's power to the creature's controller.

name: Ancient Kavu
oracle_text: {2}: Ancient Kavu becomes colorless until end of turn.
flavor_text: Those with the ability to change their nature survived Phyrexia's biological attacks. Everything else died.

name: Ancient Spring

Ancient Spring enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.

oracle_text:
Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)
Vigilance

name: Armadillo Cloak
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
flavor_text:
"Don't laugh. It works."
—Yavimaya ranger

name: Barrin's Unmaking
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand if that permanent shares a color with the most common color among all permanents or a color tied for most common.

name: Benalish Lancer
oracle_text:
Kicker {2}{W} (You may pay an additional {2}{W} as you cast this spell.)
If Benalish Lancer was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike.

name: Benalish Trapper
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: "I'm up here. You're down there. Now who's the lower life form?"

name: Bog Initiate
flavor_text:
"Urborg's magic is strong. Did Urza send you to protect us or to protect against us?"
—Urborg witch, to Barrin

name: Capashen Unicorn
oracle_text: {1}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Capashen Unicorn: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: Capashen riders were stern and humorless even before their ancestral home was reduced to rubble.

name: Crimson Acolyte
oracle_text:
Protection from red
{W}: Target creature gains protection from red until end of turn.
flavor_text:
The faithful will walk through streams of fire and emerge unscathed.
—Crimson acolyte creed

name: Crown of Flames
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{R}: Return Crown of Flames to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"All my life I've fought these monsters. Today I finish that fight."
—Barrin

name: Cursed Flesh
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text: Misery, filth, disease—all things that bring suffering to the world—only make Phyrexians more dangerous.

name: Dismantling Blow
oracle_text:
Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If this spell was kicked, draw two cards.

name: Dream Thrush
oracle_text:
Flying
{T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

name: Duskwalker
oracle_text:
Kicker {3}{B} (You may pay an additional {3}{B} as you cast this spell.)
If Duskwalker was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

name: Exclude
oracle_text:
Counter target creature spell.
Draw a card.

"I don't have time for you right now."
—Teferi

name: Exotic Curse
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Domain — Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each basic land type among lands you control.
flavor_text:

oracle_text:
Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.)

name: Faerie Squadron
oracle_text:
Kicker {3}{U} (You may pay an additional {3}{U} as you cast this spell.)
If Faerie Squadron was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with flying.

name: Fertile Ground
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

name: Firescreamer
oracle_text: {R}: Firescreamer gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: In the dark, it's nearly invisible—until it exhales.

name: Frenzied Tilling
oracle_text: Destroy target land. Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"Beneath her scars, Dominaria's beauty yet shines."

oracle_text: Protection from red
flavor_text: "Are they on our side?" asked Sisay. "If they kill Phyrexians they are," replied Gerrard.

Flying

oracle_text:

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

name: Holy Day
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

name: Hooded Kavu

name: Maniacal Rage

Enchant creature

Enchant creature

name: Nomadic Elf

oracle_text:
Protection from black

The truthful will stand in the gaze of death and escape unharmed.

oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

name: Recoil
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Then that player discards a card.

name: Recover

name: Repulse

Return target creature to its owner's hand.

name: Restrain
oracle_text:

oracle_text:

Enchant creature
